utm.title: Urchin Tracking Module (UTM) Generator
utm.heading: UTM Generator
utm.caption: Create links with UTM parameters to measure the performance of your marketing campaigns.
utm.generated_url_text: Use this address in any promotional channel you wish to associate with this custom campaign.
utm.form_title: Enter website URL and campaign information
utm.base_text: The full address of the website you want to promote.
utm.source_text: The origin of your traffic, such as a website, social network, or platform (e.g., google, facebook, newsletter).
utm.medium_text: The marketing medium used: for example, email, CPC, banner, social, etc.
utm.campaign_text: Identifies the campaign you are running: product name, promotion, or strategy (e.g., summer2025, blackfriday).
utm.id_text: A unique ID for the ad campaign, useful for internal analysis or linking with other platforms.
utm.term_text: Keywords for paid search campaigns. Helps analyze the performance of specific terms.
utm.content_text: Distinguishes between different versions of an ad or link within the same campaign.
